A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I left with more questions than i had when i went in. So much we hoped to be explained from 'The Force Awakens' wasn't even touched on and was extremely disappointing. While watching this\, if you need the toilet just wait for when Finn and Rose go to the casino. Most unnecessary and pointless chunk of a film I've ever seen. I expected so much more from this film. lets hope they can make up for this in the next one.
